thread.title: Video: The Obamas sing ‘Happy Birthday’ to Usher
thread.title_full: Video: The Obamas sing ‘Happy Birthday’ to Usher

title: Video: The Obamas sing ‘Happy Birthday’ to Usher
text:
Source: Ghana | Myjoyonline.com Date: 19-10-2015 Time: 08:10:11:am 
American R&B singer, Usher, born Terry Raymond IV, turned 37 on October 14 and got a birthday surprise he least expected. 
A super star, the award-winning singer had the world’s most power couple - President Barack Obama and First Lady Michelle Obama - singing happy birthday to him at the White House. 
Watch the video below:
